mapper.select: SELECT (@rownum :=@rownum+1) as rownum, t.* from ( select * from (select a.id, c.name as userName, a.user,a.uname,a.uphone, DATE_FORMAT(a.utime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as utime,a.beizhu, b.title, a.house, a.flag,b.user_name,b.user_phone FROM rent_appointment a, rent_houseinfo b ,rent_user c where a.house=b.id and c.username=a.user and c.userType=0 and utime>=SYSDATE() and a.user=#{user}) e) t, (select @rownum:=#{page}) as rn order by utime asc limit #{page},#{limit}
